name: Cat's Cradle (itch) (JakeW2003)
description:
In Cat's Cradle, you are a mouse on the run in a maze controlled by cats! How many levels can you escape while dodging the mouse traps, yarn traps and laser pointers set out to stop you?

Controls:

Up - W or Up Arrow Key

Left - A or Left Arrow Key

Down - S or Down Arrow Key

Right - D or Right Arrow Key

Camera Zoom - Mouse Scroll

Pause - Esc
